name: pouchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like or forming a pouch (= a soft bag), or a soft, round shape: He was a middle-aged man whose pouchy face was hidden beneath a large brimmed hat. We ate pouchy little steamed dumplings in an incredibly hot chilli sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesHe plays the careworn detective as pouchy, and two days away from his last shave.She was a frightening figure with a pouchy, unsmiling face framed by thick, black hair.He's looking increasingly pouchy and weary these days.
